content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Nesibe. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I have taken the time to consider your offer, and I believe we can come to an agreement. I propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. This price reflects the value of the apartment and the location in Mannheim. What do you think about this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding. "
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: You're welcome, Nesibe. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. I look forward to your tenancy in the apartment. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you Mister Heine. I will be in touch with you if I need anything. I will be moving in on the 1st of August. "
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: You're welcome, Nesibe. I'm glad to hear that you'll be moving in on the 1st of August. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
